article.para: This ONLINE HANDBOOK OF LATIN PHONETICS was authored by xxxxxxxxxx (Classics and Digital Humanities) with the informatic assistance of xxxxxxx for the XXXXX UNIVERSITY PRESS of the XXXXXXX University of XXXXXXX.
